# Long Knife, Elven
## Overview
This long, thin knife is balanced for throwing despite the slight curve in its blade. Wood elf hunters and assassins favor this weapon because of its great versatility and small size.

**Source:** Races of Renown: Bow and Blade (Green Ronin), pg. 85
